preferences.name: port
preferences.title: anki-connect port
preferences.description: Port that anki-connect uses. (Default: 8765)

preferences.name: allow_dup_cards
preferences.label: Allow Duplicate Cards
preferences.description: If selected, duplicate cards can be created

preferences.name: dup_scope
preferences.title: Duplicate Scope
preferences.description: Can be used to specify the scope for which duplicates are checked

preferences.name: default_deck
preferences.title: Default Deck
preferences.description: Deck name to pre-select when adding cards (overrides remembered value)

preferences.name: default_model
preferences.title: Default Note Type
preferences.description: Note type (model) to pre-select when adding cards (overrides remembered value)

preferences.name: default_tags
preferences.title: Default Tags
preferences.description: Comma-separated tags applied automatically to new cards

preferences.name: ai_enabled
preferences.label: Enable AI Assist
preferences.description: Show AI-powered actions for card generation and improvement

preferences.name: ai_api_key
preferences.title: Vercel AI Gateway API Key
preferences.description: API key from your Vercel AI Gateway dashboard (vercel.com/ai-gateway)

preferences.name: ai_model
preferences.title: AI Model
preferences.description: Model in provider/name format (e.g. google/gemini-2.5-flash-lite, openai/gpt-4o-mini, anthropic/claude-sonnet-4)

preferences.name: ai_max_output_tokens
preferences.title: AI Max Output Tokens
preferences.description: Maximum tokens in AI response

preferences.name: ai_temperature
preferences.title: AI Temperature
preferences.description: Creativity level (0.0 = deterministic, 1.0 = creative)

preferences.name: ai_note_type_mode
preferences.title: AI Note Type Mode
preferences.description: How AI chooses between Basic and Cloze note types

preferences.name: ai_max_clozes_per_card
preferences.title: Max Clozes per Card
preferences.description: Maximum cloze deletions per card to keep cards atomic

preferences.name: ai_dry_run
preferences.label: AI Dry Run (preview only)
preferences.description: Preview AI output without writing to form fields

preferences.name: basic_model_name
preferences.title: Basic Model Name
preferences.description: Name of your Anki Basic note type

preferences.name: cloze_model_name
preferences.title: Cloze Model Name
preferences.description: Name of your Anki Cloze note type

preferences.name: ai_model_heavy
preferences.title: AI Model — Generation & Scoring
preferences.description: Model for generation, improvement, and scoring (e.g. openai/gpt-4o). Leave blank to use default model.

preferences.name: ai_model_light
preferences.title: AI Model — Tags & Auto-Fill
preferences.description: Model for tags, auto-fill, and quick tasks (e.g. google/gemini-2.0-flash). Leave blank to use default model.

preferences.name: ai_auto_score_on_add
preferences.label: Auto-score card before add
preferences.description: When enabled, Add Card runs AI quality scoring first and asks for confirmation.

commands.name: addCard
commands.title: Add Card
commands.subtitle: Anki
commands.description: Add a card to a deck in Anki

preferences.name: allow_empty_card_fields
preferences.label: Allow empty card fields
preferences.description: Enabling this will allow you to create cards with empty fields

preferences.name: enable_attachments
preferences.label: Enable file attachments on cards
preferences.description: Show file picker fields for each card field
